Reviews.Title: Buy an external case, know exactly what you're buying - and what you're not...
Reviews.Author: Sam I Am
Reviews.Content: The iPhone 4 (regardless of your cell phone carrier) works best if it has a case. There was some issue with the iPhone 4 and the quality of the internal cell phone antenna. Without the case, I drop from full reception to only one bar. I had the same exact issues when I owned an unlocked iPhone 4 which I used with T-Mobile. So I highly recommend also purchasing an external case, to protect your phone as well as improve the cell phone signal.Definitely you need to understand what you're buying. This iPhone will not work on any wireless carrier other than Verizon. You can't take this phone and switch over to AT&T; or T-Mobile service, because they use a different cell phone technology than Verizon. A lot of the unhappy user reviews posted on Amazon for this product suggest to me that in many cases, the buyer just didn't understand what they were purchasing.Another problem may be with the prefilled Amazon product description. This is not technically an "unlocked phone." An unlocked iPhone is one that will work on different cell phone carriers, so some people may have bought the phone relying on the word "unlocked," which is completly inaccurate and misleading. This phone will only work on the Verizon network.There's no SIM card slot on the  Verizon iPhone, and by design, there's no memory card slot either. You'll have to live with the 8 GB (actually closer to 6 GB) of space available on the phone. I've kept my iPod for listening to music - my primary reason for buying this iPhone 4 was so I could use it as a phone.My final suggestion is this: anyone who buys this iPhone from Amazon should not wait to activate it with Verizon. Even if you've bought it as a gift, don't wait to make sure the phone works, because on the off-chance the phone was reported lost or stolen and deactivated by Verizon(a "bad ESN"), you will need to get in contact with Amazon right away so you can send the phone back for a refund. This is one of the advantages of buying directly from Amazon - you might pay more money but at least, if you buy from them (and not from one of their third-party sellers), you have Amazon customer service to watch your back. Just make sure you're buying the iPhone on a sale page that says "fulfilled by Amazon."  This is the one you want, because at least you know Amazon will stand behind the purchase.

Reviews.Title: my first ever foray into an  I phone and this one was wonderful

Reviews.Title: What can I say?

Reviews.Title: iPhone awesome

As anyone I skeptical about buying a used phone, but I love it, family and friends cant even tell it was used. I would definetly recommend this product to anyone considering it.

Reviews.Title: used Iphone purchase

Verizon activated it and kept me on my current plan with additional features and so I am very happy with the purcahase. I don't require the latest tech updates and am quite happy with the internet access and the ease of use with this iphone. I prefer simplicity as opposed to all fo the bells and whistles and complexity that comes with all of the new phones.

Reviews.Title: iphone

Reviews.Content: i did not like it because the seller did not describe this item well and nowhere in the description did it say there was a crack and it took very long for him to shp it it was scratched the edges were bent and cracked i did not like it at all

Reviews.Title: Never loved anything so much
Reviews.Author: mjhs7english
Reviews.Content: I really wanted a phone for my 7th grade year of school. My dad said he was getting me a phone but, but he surprised me me with the White I phone 4-8GB. It was my dream phone. I like how it is white so it can go with almost every color of a case. I also like that I can have apps and music on my phone. I like it because if I get bored somewhere and I have my phone with me then I can just pull out my phone and play a game or listen to music. There is only one bad thing I can think of and that is that I only have 8 gigabytes so I can only have so much music and apps. You can change that though when you buy one.I recommend this I phone for someone who uses their phone a lot and is willing to pay for it each month. I recommend it for all ages. All ages are great because it is easy to use. My grandma has one and loves it, even my 2 year old cousin knows how to use one.

Reviews.Title: Fit the description perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Awesome :)
Reviews.Author: cml3458

Reviews.Title: Not Happy at all
Reviews.Author: Pineda Family
Reviews.Content: First of all what it says about the Iphone is totally different from what was mailed to me. I received the iPhone 4 8gb with the carrier sprint!! Not Verizon how it was described. It says it had a crack in the back of the phone what it didn't say is that there was a long crack on the front of the phone as well.. It has some wear on the corner overall I was not pleased with the phone. The seller didn't mention the wear it had on mostly all four corners. Second of all not so good customer service.. I promptly mailed it back to the seller I had to pay the shipping myself cause he didn't provide that even though he sold me a totally different described Iphone I have not gotten a reply from the seller nor my money back!! I'm not happy at all with this. I'm still waiting for this matter to be resolved.. I'm not buying anything else from this seller...

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: MELISSA SNIDER
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone it worked.  Then I dropped it.  Went to replace the screen it was definetly a refurbished phone!There were screws missing and no waterguard!  Do yourself a favor and save and buy a refurbished one at least you know what your getting!

Reviews.Title: poor communication
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: I just bought my mother an iphone from this seller like two weeks ago, but when i went to connect the phone we found out it wasn't for the same company that it says its for, so I decided to return it and I yet to hear results for my refund from this seller, not one message or email or concern for the customer.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Hunter Weber
Reviews.Content: The listing says that it is brand new but meanwhile it has a remanufactured sticker on the box. One of the speakers are blown and it runs really slowly when two apps are running at once. The google maps also sucks. Definently not worth $200

Reviews.Title: nice phone for my teenage son
Reviews.Author: Valery Reach
Reviews.Content: My son has enjoyed the phone and hasn't had any technical problems at all. It is easy to use and he likes the size of the phone and the screen size as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: N. H. Derby
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived before expected, in condition as listed, phone works great even visual voicemail which I did not expect to work on Straight Talk, a little difficulty activating with Straight Talk, overall a great value, may purchase one for my son!

Reviews.Title: Amazon sold me a stolen I-phone
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: Wasn't too happy when I tried to activate my I-phone and Verizon told me they could not because the phone was on their list of stolen phones.  I thought Amazon was a safe place to buy.  I'm checking to see if Amazon will take the phone back and refund me.  More to come...

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: Just Me
Reviews.Content: I ordered mine "used - like new" from Amazon Warehouse, from Amazon directly. It came in the wrong box (it came in a 4S box) but it was indeed like new, and came with the charger, USB cable, and earphones. It had a clean serial number - as it should - and I had no problems getting it activated.This is NOT the latest and greatest, obviously, but it still runs well and I still recommend it - especially to be used as a prepaid phone.

Reviews.Title: Charging port not charging
Reviews.Author: Ashlee Forde
Reviews.Content: I have always been an apple supporter.  I am actually typing his from a mac book pro right now.  However, this phone... this phone...  Where do I start.  I have had this phone for quiet some time now.  Yes, it looks sleek, however the screen is tiny and made from glass.  The back side of the phone is also a glass substitute.  This means that if you drop if (luckily i have not yet) it will crack the exterior of your phone.  Who on earth puts glass on a cell phone. But this is not even the most upsetting part, and maybe I should direct this anger and frustration more towards apple themselves.The still sell the apple iPhone 4 is select mobile retailers, however what they do not tell you is ios7 is NOT made for iPhone 4.  So when you download up/update your phone, the i phone 4 will run slower then it did before.I do not care what people think about the great aps (that were not made my apple themselves but other companies) when the phone force close you out of a app while you are trying to use it... it defeats the purpose.  This has happened of countless occasions.THE CHARGING PORT!The charging port is what I really wanted to get to.  Today when I woke up I noticed that my phone had not charged at all.  I have plugged it into the apple wall charger and the divide still read 3% this morning.  I tried taking it to an AT&T; store and was told that I needed to go to an apple store.  It was a 1.5 hour trip to the closest apple store.  Once I was there they told me "This thing happens quiet a lot, however there is nothing we can do besides replace the device.  It seems like your warranty ran out last month, it will be $149.99 to get a almost new phone"This is not something I did to the phone.  I did not drop it, get it wet, shove crap in the charging ports, why does this "happen quiet frequently"???  The apple employee did not know the answer to this.So if you are looking for a phone that looks cool but runs like a piece of crap then this is the phone for you.  I need to re-think the apple features (iCloud) and see if it is time to let this "iPhone fad" be over and get a phone that is actually dependable and not a total waste of money!!

Reviews.Title: looks good

Reviews.Content: i spent the extra couple dollars to make sure i got an iphone that said like new on the product description and this iphone is obviously NOT like new there is scratches on 2 of the 4 corners and a small hairline fracture on the back of the phone below the camera not complaining that this phone doesnt work perfect or do what its supposed to but if i would have known that it would have this much sign or wear on it i would have saved the $20 and just bought one that said it was in Good condition welp whatevss

Reviews.Title: my Iphone

Reviews.Content: LOVE IT - love it.  I never have had a "cool phone" and finally decided it was time,,,,I made the right choice!!  It does everything

Reviews.Title: LOVE!

Reviews.Title: LOVE!

Reviews.Content: I love my phone and I've had it for 7 months now. Everything is still working beautifully and it was definitely a great buy!

They kept telling me it could be corrected but it never was.  I finally sent it back after waiting 5 days and did receive my refund.

Reviews.Title: STOLEN PHONE
Reviews.Author: scott lipton
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE WAS NOT CLEAN IT WAS DEATIVATED/STOLEN THE DESCRIPTION WAS A COMPLETE LIE THIS GUY IS A TOTAL SCAMMER

Reviews.Title: Good timing
Reviews.Author: Billie Greene
Reviews.Content: Came looking brand new.  Gift for my husband and he has no complaints.  Time frame was great.  Got it quick

Reviews.Title: Love it still having used to its full
Reviews.Author: Mary Beth Catterton
Reviews.Content: I choose to quick access to internetThe phone is user friendlyIt is a little bigger than I m used too but adjusted

Reviews.Title: damaged
Reviews.Author: jane ohara
Reviews.Content: maybe it was damaged in transit but I never was able to use it at all  the back was cracked  open

Reviews.Title: Phone Is No Good
Reviews.Author: Margaret Oliver
Reviews.Content: I have had the phone about a month. When I received the "new" phone the box was open and it was not cleared to factory settings. I found that odd, but just cleared it myself.I immediately noticed that I was unable to take a screenshot on a consistent basis. It works every once in a while. Furthermore, the phone is very slow and unresponsive. The apps are slow to open, laggy while in them, and slow to close. Imagine waiting 3 seconds before each and every action. Typing in apps is tedious due to the delay. The apps also have a tendency to close out of themselves for no reason.I use my phone as an mp3 player as well. Unfortunately the music has issues. The screen will often go black once inside the app so I cannot select songs. I have to close out of it and skip songs through the locked screen. This is irksome if I want to listen to something specific. Eventually the screen will correct itself again and I'll usually have enough time to pick the next set of songs.Overall, I am very unhappy with this purchase. The only reason I gave it two stars instead of one was because it was not cracked or scratched.

Reviews.Title: Slow but dependable.
Reviews.Author: Kalin Rowell
Reviews.Content: Kind of slow...in every aspect (sending messages, loading, etc) Crappy autocorrect and very poor camera quality. If you absolutely needed a decent working smartphone this is a good find (especially for the price that was asked for it), but if you're impatient (like me), I would not recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Power button does not work. Phone not in condition as advertised. I will choose a different seller for my next purchase.

Reviews.Title: New Phone Not New
Reviews.Author: Andrea Smith
Reviews.Content: When I received the phone which was listed as "new", there were pictures and videos on it.  Couldn't understand what they were saying in the videos because they were in a different language but they were there nevertheless.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: cherie
Reviews.Content: The front camera doesn't work and the phone has no slot for a storage card. Poor quality if you ask me,  paid for something that wasn't actually suggested

Reviews.Title: Great Deal

Reviews.Content: Good as new and for a lot less than cellphone carriers were asking. Functions great and has very minimal visual wear.

Reviews.Title: Good I phone
Reviews.Author: Rosy Sharma
Reviews.Content: Scratch less phone works fine only problem is speaker does not work if you don't need to use the speaker then buy it

Reviews.Title: It works but
Reviews.Author: tamisha cooley
Reviews.Content: The works however I can tell it has some type of water damage it cuts off buy with no worning when the battery is low I just wish he would of told me there was some type of damag to the phone

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: Sharon Thornal "retired"
Reviews.Content: I returned this phone as it was not what I wanted. It was too small and they did not send a charger with it.

Reviews.Title: Apple I Phome 4
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Smith
Reviews.Content: My son lost his phone and a replacement was going to be $500+. This used phone was in perfect condition and works as well as a new phone.

Reviews.Title: Apple I Phome 4
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Smith
Reviews.Content: My son lost his phone and a replacement was going to be $500+. This used phone was in perfect condition and works as well as a new phone.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Nelson
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was hoping for! Absolutely a 9/10!!!! Phone is in great condition and activated smoothly. Will recommend to everyone

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4
Reviews.Author: Roma
Reviews.Content: I am really excited to get my phone and the seller was very helpful. The descriptions says it is refurbished but that they replaced basically everything like the screen, which seems like a great way to make sure the phone is actually like new. However, after the order shipped I tried to track it but theres no tracking number. I understand that some packages, per Amazons explanation, cant be tracked though I've never had an un-trackable item. This would be ok but seller hasnt responded to my multiple emails asking for the tracking information so I can be certain someone is here to accept the phone since I am very busy and I do not want it to be sent back. If the seller would respond to my email I will change my feedback back to 5 stars when I get my package and the seller contacts me.

Reviews.Title: My Best Phone Yet!
Reviews.Author: Dylan Morris
Reviews.Content: iPhone has always been popular among texting fanatics and touchscreeners and it doesn't prove wrong with the iPhone 4 with iOS 7!! It features retina display, a mighty enhancement to the series, and FaceTime- Keep up with family and friends anywhere in the world! I bought mine so that I could play all the games on my old 3GS, which still run fine on the 4 and so that I could experience everything in iOS 7!!! I thought that iOS 7 would be hard to get used to, but in fact it's actually just the same, and even a bit easier and better (Of Course) I think I might surprise my mom with one of these...That's how awesome they are!!Pros:1. Amazing selection of features and apps2. Beautiful Retina Display!!3. FaceTime and iMessage FUn!4. Game Center and MP3 player5. Easy To Use Control CenterCons:1. Passbook needs to be more readily usable2. No Licensed Emulators Available (Unlike Android)3. AWFUL grip on Silent Mode SwitchI highly recommend this Phone To Anyone up for some fun!! Hope you go dive right in to it! Enjoy! THANK YOU APPLE!! ;-)

Reviews.Title: Best Deal Ever!!!!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Romero
Reviews.Content: I bought a iPhone 4 from Verizon for $140 I honestly thought it was going to be horrible, but I ended up eating my own words. This was an amazing iPhone 4 for the price it wasn't  cracked anywhere I'm so thrilled with the outcome.

Reviews.Title: Just Like new.

Reviews.Title: good

It didn't take that long at all. The phone was in great condition. It was a used one. You couldn't even tell! It works great! I give the service 5 stars' amazing! Really reliable I will definitely use them again.

Reviews.Content: This product was everything that i asked for the only thing i didnt know it had a cracked screen' , overall it was in good condition and it works well

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Myra

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter, it came on time and works perfectly. I read the reviews for the used phones and they were bad so I bought mine new. Great phone.

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter, it came on time and works perfectly. I read the reviews for the used phones and they were bad so I bought mine new. Great phone.

Reviews.Content: It looks really brand new the first time that I opened the little package- it's sleek and and in great condition. I recommend this phone to anyone who doesn't have it. It's a great phone! Thanks for the reading :)!

Reviews.Title: I'm up and running again!
Reviews.Author: Ann Daly
Reviews.Content: I lost my IPhone and found with my business that I was lost without it.  After a week of using one of my old phones, I ordered a new IPhone and everything is running smoothly again.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4.
Reviews.Author: Emmylou Mallery
Reviews.Content: Thank you for the phone. It works great. Just sent a crappy case with it. Was broken won't work. Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: Like New!
Reviews.Author: Lara Johnson
Reviews.Content: A&Z; Tech were awesome to work with. The phone looks brand new and works perfectly. Came to us extremely fast as well. Questions we had were answered promptly.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!!!!
Reviews.Author: barbie
Reviews.Content: I order this phone and received it in the mail in two days. The shipping was super fast! I was able to get my phone turned on at Verizon and so far everything has been working properly. I do not have, nor had  any problems since I bought this phone. I would recommend this product to any one looking to purchase a new iPhone 4. The phone was in its original packaging. /The package came with all the contents. I love it.

Reviews.Title: lost/stolen phone
Reviews.Author: Michelle Dowsey
Reviews.Content: VERY upset.  went to activate the phone and it was a lost/stolen phone.  absolutely rediculous and i don't know how he can get away with continuing to sell these.

Reviews.Title: Used Apple 4

Reviews.Content: we were hesitant to make this purchase but decided to go for it...we are very pleased with this vendor.  The phone is in excellent condition and has been trouble free.  Cheaper that getting a replacement thru Verizon.

Reviews.Content: Perfect phone except the power button sticks a bit, but for the price a perfect phone bought it to replace my wifes dropped and shattered iPhone 4

Reviews.Content: Received the phone in perfect condition as expected and also on time.  This was purchased to replace a stolen phone before our Verizon contract was eligible for an upgrade.  It's worked well and saved us a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: I phone 4
Reviews.Author: ROBERT DARRIGO
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son best deal I ever made phone was better than new and more the half the original price  shop amazon

Reviews.Title: used iphone 4

Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Content: Perfect condition and works as it would be as new. Had it on a more than satisfying price which was absolutely neat!

Reviews.Title: Good Phone.  Good Price.
Reviews.Author: TammyB
Reviews.Content: Good phone for the price.  There wasn't anything wrong with it; it worked like it's supposed to.  I've had it for more than six months now and still no problems.  Will use it until my contract is up.

Reviews.Title: love love love
Reviews.Author: KatieKat963
Reviews.Content: I got this because it is so much more user friendly than Androids and other smart phones. The interface is really intuitive so you don't end up pulling your hair out just trying to get your email set up. Great for first time smart phone owners or the tech savvy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: LilTrujis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a birthday gift for my son. It was so easy to set up, activate, and transfer all his information and games from his IPod. I received it super fast too which was a plus! Highly recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: iphone 4

Reviews.Content: GREAT phone, the phone I got from Here was in great conditions! Almost like new! It only came with a FEW scratch on the side. But you can barely see it.

Reviews.Content: Theres nothing wrong with how it works, it looks new beside thaa lil scratches on thaa sides but its fine for mii, thats watt phone covers are for so I'm not complaining.. Im glad i got this phone :) its amazing.

Reviews.Title: Dig a little deeper before ordering one of these iPhones.
Reviews.Author: Courtney was here...
Reviews.Content: I have read lots of bad reviews for this phone, and to be perfectly honest a lot of them are very justified. But, I really would like to stress please take note of the satisfaction percentages belonging to these vendors. Also, take a little time to read a few pages of reviews before you buy an iphone. I purchased mine from Better Deals FASTER. The reviews for this company were great. Also, the companies Planet Mobile and Applewireless are outstanding as well.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Margo Ogden
Reviews.Content: This product has met all of the expectations that my daughter had for Apple products.  She has not had any negative eperiences with it so far.  Her experiences so far have been very positive because she continues to find (her words) "awesome" iPhone features that her other phone did not offer.  I would buy this product again.

Reviews.Content: When I received the phone, I turned it on and it appeared on the screen that the phone was stolen and it had been wiped. I cannot use it, so I have to go to Verizon and get it all sorted out. Terrible...

Reviews.Title: Just what I ordered.
Reviews.Author: charles pirtle
Reviews.Content: Ordered to update my daughters phone. This was more than I expected. Could not have been anymore than pleased. Called Verizon when we got it and off to the races. Thanks a million.

Reviews.Author: H. Schuller "londonerlady"

Reviews.Title: Love my IPHONE

Reviews.Content: Seller was very prompt with shipping this product! Iphone was in awesome condition (like new) as the seller had stated! So glad to have an Iphone again!!! I will never go to another product for cell phones again!

Reviews.Title: Best Smart phone on the market
Reviews.Author: David Pouliot
Reviews.Content: Great deal for a refurbished iphone 4. I wanted to upgrade my wife's cell phone to an iPhone 4 and for less than $200 I was able to get her a GREAT PHONE. It works well and she LOVES IT!We've had for a month now and works great. The battery life is longer and requires less charging time.It's a win/win.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS VERY GOOD

Reviews.Content: IT WAS REALLY GOOD WE HAD A GREAT ACTIVATION AND WE DONT HAVE ANY PROBLEMS WITH IT YOU SHOULD GET ITFUN, FAST, GOOD QUALITY

Reviews.Title: Perfect Purchase
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I lost my iphone 4 in the lake and needed a replacement ASAP.  I was apprehensive about buying a phone from a private seller but desperation will make you try things you wouldn't ordinarily do.  Turns out the iphone 4 purchased is EXACTLY what the seller said it would be.  It appears to be brand new and works fantastically.  I have been using it for almost 3 weeks now and have not had one single problem with it.  Battery life is great as well.  Can't tell any difference between this new phone and my previous Verizon retailer one.  VERY VERY HAPPY with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Awsome customer service
Reviews.Author: Nilesh Patel
Reviews.Content: He gave me his full effort to meet my expectation and it was one of the best service provider up to now. I am really happy with this product. Thanx a lot..

Reviews.Title: So HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my girlfriend and it arrived within 3 days!! It was here well before the expected date, the look on her face when she opened the package was priceless. Everything was beyond my expectations! Keep up the wonderful work!!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4 8GB White
Reviews.Author: Jeff Story
Reviews.Content: Phone was 4 months old, but has come in and behaved like a BRAND NEW Phone!  Very Very Very Pleased.

Reviews.Title: bad esn, wouldn't unlock
Reviews.Author: Alicia Buyarski "lee55"
Reviews.Content: This phone had a bad esn and wouldn't unlock with a new plan.None of the customer service people could help me with this either, and kept making me call another representative or call verizon (who also couldn't help me)My first time ever buying from warehouse deals, and now I realize... if it seems too good to be true, it probably is.

Reviews.Title: Arrived on time
Reviews.Author: tidaho
Reviews.Content: First time buying something used. The phone arrived on time for my daughter'sbirthday. Overall it did meet my expectations.The phone was just a bit dirty and missing the wall plug for charging.It was a fair price and has been working fine!

Reviews.Title: No signal?
Reviews.Author: B. Mogensen
Reviews.Content: I got this phone and everything looked good. I got it connected to Verizon no problem, but it barely gets a signal anywhere. I thought it was the network, but it isn't. I went to NYC this past week and I couldn't use my phone at all due to no signal. The phone is terrible. I have no need for a phone with no signal...I want a phone and not an iPod.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4 8gb
Reviews.Author: Bhen
Reviews.Content: Perfect condition , almost like new ! Just as the seller stated ! I was so thrilled when I got the device and it activated with no problem ! I would definitely consider the seller again !

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4
Reviews.Author: Goran
Reviews.Content: The Phone is ok, new as described, but to my opinion will need more description in products as type of phone GSM or CDMA, and some small details which can make buyer easier to decide. In Overall the seller is OK, and the phone is brand new. All recommendation for the Seller

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Bourbeau
Reviews.Content: I was worried buying an iPhone online but I got this one and it works great. I love it. Its in perfect condition!

Reviews.Title: perfect i love it
Reviews.Author: nelson cartier
Reviews.Content: I love iphones so please buy this you want regret it at all the price is unbeatable for such a perfect phone

Reviews.Title: Great seller!
Reviews.Author: hhyatt
Reviews.Content: Item was as describe and did receive on time, way quicker too... Only about 3 days. I was replied to almost immediately, shorter than 24 hours. Phone meets expectations of a used phone. You can tell the software isn't brand new but it still runs smoothly and would buy from them again!!

Reviews.Title: New phone
Reviews.Author: Jerson
Reviews.Content: Brand new phone that is how I see it in , in incredible condition I love it for my first smart phone

Reviews.Title: Sold as "NEW" but it was Used or Refurb- Beware
Reviews.Author: EGadgetFix- Gilbert Garcia
Reviews.Content: I thought I was buying a brand new iPhone 4, at least that was the description. When I got it and opened it, the "Q and the "1" was defective. I returned for Money Back. Two stars, only for coming in a scheduled.

Reviews.Title: It works well and user friendly.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Boyd
Reviews.Content: It works well and user friendly. I don't like that I got overcharged for data on my first month though.

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: Sharon Thornal "retired"
Reviews.Content: I returned this phone as it was not what I wanted. It was too small and they did not send a charger with it.

Reviews.Title: little scratch on the screen but so far good condition
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: little scratch on the screen but so far good condition. little scratch on the screen but so far good condition. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: C.Evans
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my phone and even tough it was a used phone, It did not have any major flaws! excited about this phone!

Reviews.Title: False Advertising?
Reviews.Author: John Cominski
Reviews.Content: Ordered a iPhone 4 8GB - Verizon from this seller via Amazon for a Birthday gift.  Daughter went to the Verizon Store to activate the phone and found out the phone was a "Sprint" phone and not compatible with the Verizon Network.  Ended up having to spend about three hours to get her old phone reactivated, and then Amazon tells us that we need to wait for the phone to be returned, have a refund processed and start all over. Maybe something to be said for a brick and mortar when all of this could have been cleared up in a hour or two instead of weeks.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Scottland
Reviews.Content: I order this phone and within no time the screen stop working. I'm not a big apple fan don't know if I won't another one unless it is brand new.

Reviews.Title: iOS 7 is just the worst thing for this once great phone.
Reviews.Author: elchamber
Reviews.Content: I used to love this phone.  So long Steve Jobs and your great phone.  iOS 7 just made the iPhone 4 not an iPhone.  My iPod Touch(2nd gen) is doing much better than my iPhone 4.iOS 7.0.4I CAN'T TURN OFF ANYTHING ANY MORE!I can't upload music into this phone anymore via iTunes.  When I TRY, it leaves my phone hanging on "waiting for changes to..."I can't sync it to iCloud without having a pop-up message telling me to put in my password to an individual email account.I can't go to the app store and download an app without telling me it can't download and install the app at this time.  The only way to do this is go back to the app store in my phone and RE-DOWNLOAD the same app.I can't restore everything from the iCloud when I do a "factory reset" AKA "Erase All Content and Settings" like before.When I need to take a quick photo of something, there is now a pause for my phone to open it on.I have to constantly turn off background apps even though they're not truly on.  They basically require another load as if you're loading them for the first time.*Before iOS7Apple will take advantage for your phone's free hard drive space to download the latest firmware update without your knowledge.  It will take up space until you allow for the change.  Until then, you're out of luck with your free space.Never trusting Apple again.  I'm jumping back to Android.  This is ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Fast and Friendly
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: I wanted to make sure I had all the information before I made this and they answered all my e-mails quickly and honestly so I can make the right buy. It came within three days, bright and early in the morning. Hooked the phone up with no problems, phone was well taken care of with a thick screen protector. Great seller, I would recommend him to anyone. Fast, Friendly, Reliable and cares about their customers

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Rudy "rainmanva"
Reviews.Content: never really been a fan of apple, but recently after hearing positive feedback from my friends/family about how great the iphone is, i figured i'd give it a try.ProsBeautiful screenComfortable solid feel in  your handvariety of apps avaliable for download (most are free)great camera and user-friendly controlsscreen is made of glass (not cheapo plastic)headphones and home charger included.battery life is considerably better than any andriod i've ever owned.Loud speakerphoneipod capablity (basically you can load all your music on your phone and go).call clarity seems good.cable is the larger one, not the small one LIKE the iphone 5.ConsAccessories can be expensiveNo real user guide packed with phone (you get a 4 page little booklet that tells you pretty much NOTHINGNot enough on board memory. if you have a large music collection 8gb isn't that much. you should consider getting the 32GB or 64GB model if you have a large music collection and want to use lots of apps.this model doesn't have SIRI.summaryi have had this phone since march of 2013. here's what i ordered to supplement my phone.first order of business was to purchase a otterbox and don't go to retail and pay 50.00 for one. instead buy one on here.OtterBox Defender Series Hybrid Case & Holster for iPhone 4 & 4S  - Retail Packaging - Blackthis can sometimes be a pain to put on, but DO IT. don't be carrying around a 400 dollar phone with NO PROTECTION. if you purchase this otterbox, make SURE you get a screen protector and put that on FIRST and then put on the otterbox. the otterbox comes with it's own screen protector, and the tiny space between the two causes what looks like a small oil slick that is impossible to get out.next i purchased a AmazonBasics 3.2 feet 1.0 Meter USB Charging/Sync Cable for Apple iPod, iPhone, and iPadI enjoy apple products but what THEY CHARGE for their cables and accessories, is flat out ridiculous! if your like me you like to have one cable for charging in the bedroom and one cable at the computer to sync content. so, i went on amazon and paid 8.99 per cable instead of going to retail and paying 20.00+ per cable. really, this one is a no brainer, never BUY ANY apple accessories at retail. you will get ripped off.you will notice that iphone docks and accessories are very expensive nearly anywhere you go, this is due to the licensing fee that 3rd parties have to pay to apple to make the device (speaker dock/alarm clock) etc work with the iphone.as for car chargers, go to walmart and get one for about $14.99 better than 50.00+ that apple charges.I purchased my phone, not through amazon but through verizon. it was a free phone, however verizon forces you to pay a $30.00 upgrade fee.all in all, this is a excellent phone. i have no real complaints. sufficent space for apps and Content. i would recommend to non-apple users. give apple a shot, if you can get past their ridiculous prices for accessories, you should be good.update 10/25/13***love this phone! still going strong and i have had it since march. i even have an app on there now that balances my checkbook! i can't say enough good things about this phone. great battery life (if you keep the wifi off)and wonderful apps and most are free. i'm glad i went with the iphone when i upgraded!

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Jordan J
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPhone 4 8gb for $99 with a two year contract with Verizon. I absolutely LOVE the iPhone which is why I got it. The price was good and overall I was really excited. I still love the iphone, I just wish that i understood what the problems were with getting the 8gb instead of the 16gb. My Instagram takes up more than a half a gig alone. I also have found that to do a system update I had to delete a ton of my apps because in order to complete the update I needed some 2 gigs or so of available space. Once the update was done I could download the apps again, but that was inconvenient. Also, "they" describe icloud as being simple and easy. I have now had the iPhone for a year and after numerous iCloud tutorials on youtube and reading about it in blogs, I still don't really understand what it is or how it works and I pride myself on being a pretty intelligent person. :) Overall, I still do love my iphone, I DO have to dump my photos onto my computer every once and a while. I will continue to use the iphone when I have to renew my contract, I will just go for a larger size next time. I hope this was helpful.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Jordan J
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPhone 4 8gb for $99 with a two year contract with Verizon. I absolutely LOVE the iPhone which is why I got it. The price was good and overall I was really excited. I still love the iphone, I just wish that i understood what the problems were with getting the 8gb instead of the 16gb. My Instagram takes up more than a half a gig alone. I also have found that to do a system update I had to delete a ton of my apps because in order to complete the update I needed some 2 gigs or so of available space. Once the update was done I could download the apps again, but that was inconvenient. Also, "they" describe icloud as being simple and easy. I have now had the iPhone for a year and after numerous iCloud tutorials on youtube and reading about it in blogs, I still don't really understand what it is or how it works and I pride myself on being a pretty intelligent person. :) Overall, I still do love my iphone, I DO have to dump my photos onto my computer every once and a while. I will continue to use the iphone when I have to renew my contract, I will just go for a larger size next time. I hope this was helpful.

Reviews.Content: Excelente atencion del vendedor, y muy rapidas sus respuestas ante todas las dudas que se me presentaron, graciaspor ser tan atentos

But besides these big defects theres a sense of fun and utility but I'm afraid with 6.4 GB its not efficient
